title: Is an iPhone with FaceID safer than one with TouchID or password? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yea Face ID is safer than Touch ID , but i am not sure that how many app developers will update their apps to support face ID . Face ID is 2 times secure Than Touch ID in general but face id is usally not that convienent in lot of situations . SO In terms of security Its yes face ID is better but in terms of usability , Touch ID is still better ( until november 2017 we can’t alot about this, So if the face ID works as demonstrated by apple it will be great )

I should say yes coj apple company core business environment is perfection, touch id has 1 out of 50000 probability to unlock , face id has 1 out of 100000 to unlock so it is safer . They won’t launch anything without testing and perfecting the products they are to afraid for that coj they don’t want their goodwill and brand to lose its value . So it is safer.
